languages.text: "Доводилось. Все мои жертвы были врагами Империума, до которых нельзя было добраться иначе. Вы бы предпочли, чтобы они жили дальше, господин Ульфар?" {n}Хейнрикс с достоинством встречает грозный взгляд Волка, игнорируя почти осязаемую волну угрозы, исходящую от Ангела Императора.{/n}

"I have. All of my victims were enemies of the Imperium who could not have been reached by any other means. Would you prefer they still be alive, my lord Ulfar?" {n}Heinrix meets the Wolf's menacing gaze with dignity, ignoring the almost palpable wave of threat emanating from the Angel of the Emperor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Доводилось. Все мои жертвы были врагами Империума, до которых нельзя было добраться иначе. Вы бы предпочли, чтобы они жили дальше, господин Ульфар?" {n}Хейнрикс с достоинством встречает грозный взгляд Волка, игнорируя почти осязаемую волну угрозы, исходящую от Ангела Императора.{/n}

languages.text: 「いかにも。我が手にかけた者は皆、あらゆる手段が及ばなかった帝国の敵。奴らがまだ生きてる方が望ましいですか、ウルファー様？」{n}ハインリックスは狼の威嚇を厳然と受け止める一方、皇帝の天使がかなり明瞭な恐怖を強く発していることは無視している。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I have. All of my victims were enemies of the Imperium who could not have been reached by any other means. Would you prefer they still be alive, my lord Ulfar?" {n}Heinrix meets the Wolf's menacing gaze with dignity, ignoring the almost palpable wave of threat emanating from the Angel of the Emperor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「いかにも。我が手にかけた者は皆、あらゆる手段が及ばなかった帝国の敵。奴らがまだ生きてる方が望ましいですか、ウルファー様？」{n}ハインリックスは狼の威嚇を厳然と受け止める一方、皇帝の天使がかなり明瞭な恐怖を強く発していることは無視している。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “没错，我杀死的每个人，都是其他方式无法消灭的帝国之敌。莫非你认为让他们活着更好，乌尔法大人？”{n}海因里希骄傲地直面乌尔法咄咄逼人的目光，无视这位帝皇天使身上几乎肉眼可见的威胁气息。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I have. All of my victims were enemies of the Imperium who could not have been reached by any other means. Would you prefer they still be alive, my lord Ulfar?" {n}Heinrix meets the Wolf's menacing gaze with dignity, ignoring the almost palpable wave of threat emanating from the Angel of the Emperor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “没错，我杀死的每个人，都是其他方式无法消灭的帝国之敌。莫非你认为让他们活着更好，乌尔法大人？”{n}海因里希骄傲地直面乌尔法咄咄逼人的目光，无视这位帝皇天使身上几乎肉眼可见的威胁气息。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Oui. Toutes mes victimes étaient des ennemis de l'Imperium que je n'aurais pas pu atteindre autrement. Vous aimeriez peut-être qu'ils soient encore en vie, seigneur Ulfar ? » {n}Heinrix soutient avec dignité le regard menaçant du Loup, ignorant l'hostilité presque palpable qui émane de lui{/n}
languages.original_text: "I have. All of my victims were enemies of the Imperium who could not have been reached by any other means. Would you prefer they still be alive, my lord Ulfar?" {n}Heinrix meets the Wolf's menacing gaze with dignity, ignoring the almost palpable wave of threat emanating from the Angel of the Emperor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Oui. Toutes mes victimes étaient des ennemis de l'Imperium que je n'aurais pas pu atteindre autrement. Vous aimeriez peut-être qu'ils soient encore en vie, seigneur Ulfar ? » {n}Heinrix soutient avec dignité le regard menaçant du Loup, ignorant l’hostilité presque palpable qui émane de lui{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Así es. Todas mis víctimas han sido enemigos del Imperium a los que, de otro modo, no se les podría haber abatido. ¿Es que preferiría que siguieran vivos, mi señor Ulfar?». {n}Heinrix enfrenta la mirada furtiva del Lobo con dignidad, ignorando la evidente amenaza que emana del ángel del Emperador.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I have. All of my victims were enemies of the Imperium who could not have been reached by any other means. Would you prefer they still be alive, my lord Ulfar?" {n}Heinrix meets the Wolf's menacing gaze with dignity, ignoring the almost palpable wave of threat emanating from the Angel of the Emperor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Así es. Todas mis víctimas han sido enemigos del Imperium a los que, de otro modo, no se les podría haber abatido. ¿Es que preferiría que siguieran vivos, mi señor Ulfar?». {n}Heinrix enfrenta la mirada furtiva del Lobo con dignidad, ignorando la evidente amenaza que emana del ángel del Emperador.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Das habe ich. Alle meine Opfer waren Feinde des Imperiums, die ich mit anderen Mitteln nicht hätte erreichen können. Wäre es Euch lieber, sie würden noch leben, Lord Ulfar?" {n}Heinrix begegnet dem drohenden Blick des Wolfs mit stoischer Würde und ignoriert die beinahe greifbare Feindseligkeit des Engels des Imperators.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I have. All of my victims were enemies of the Imperium who could not have been reached by any other means. Would you prefer they still be alive, my lord Ulfar?" {n}Heinrix meets the Wolf's menacing gaze with dignity, ignoring the almost palpable wave of threat emanating from the Angel of the Emperor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Das habe ich. Alle meine Opfer waren Feinde des Imperiums, die ich mit anderen Mitteln nicht hätte erreichen können. Wäre es Euch lieber, sie würden noch leben, Lord Ulfar?" {n}Heinrix begegnet dem drohenden Blick des Wolfs mit stoischer Würde und ignoriert die beinahe greifbare Feindseligkeit des Engels des Imperators.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Evet. Hedeflerimin tamamı, başka türlü ulaşamayacağım İmparatorluk düşmanlarıydı. Bu kişilerin yaşaması sence daha mı uygun olurdu lordum Ulfar?" {n}Kurt'un tehditkâr bakışlarını vakurlukla karşılayan Heinrix, İmparator'un Meleği'nin bariz bir şekilde saçtığı dehşeti görmezden geliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I have. All of my victims were enemies of the Imperium who could not have been reached by any other means. Would you prefer they still be alive, my lord Ulfar?" {n}Heinrix meets the Wolf's menacing gaze with dignity, ignoring the almost palpable wave of threat emanating from the Angel of the Emperor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Evet. Hedeflerimin tamamı başka türlü ulaşamayacağım İmparatorluk düşmanlarıydı. Bu kişilerin yaşaması sence daha mı uygun olurdu Ulfar efendi?" {n}Kurt'un tehditkâr bakışlarını vakurlukla karşılayan Heinrix, İmparator'un Meleği'nden âdeta bariz hâlde yayılan dehşeti görmezden geliyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
